| Quotation               = We Omegans were an accident, [[Phaa (Earth-616)|Phaa]]...The product of [[Hywell Griffin (Earth-616)|Alpha]]'s search for a cure to his own albinism...But we are superior; our logic is unencumbered by emotion or ego. Alpha no longer values our perfection...He thinks to make us obsolete.
| Speaker                 = [[Raee (Earth-616)|Raee]]
| QuoteSource             = ClanDestine Vol 2 3
| Overview                = The Omegans are a minions of [[Hywell Griffin (Earth-616)|Dr. Hywell Griffin]].
| History                 = The Omegans were created by accidentally by [[Hywell Griffin (Earth-616)|Dr. Hywell Griffin]] while he was searching to cure his albinism. The five Omegans were beings of only logic with no emotions, giving them a drone like appearance. The Omegans were conditioned to be obedient to Griffin, who they call '''Alpha'''.{{r|ClanDestine Vol 2 3}}

While researching the [[Genetic Realignment Yield Polarity Harmonizing Orientation Net|Gryphon]] and the assassinations of their siblings, [[Walter Destine (Earth-616)|Wallop]] along with [[Rory Destine (Earth-616)|Crimson Crusader]] and [[Pandora Destine (Earth-616)|Imp]] into the [[Griffin Research Complex|Griffin Technologies Research Complex]] where they were ambushed by Alpha and the Omegans.{{r|ClanDestine Vol 1 4}} Due to their mental conditioning, the Omegans were especially susceptible to [[Jasmine Destine (Earth-616)|Cuckoo]]'s telepathic suggestion. When Cuckoo and [[Samantha Destine (Earth-616)|Samantha Hasard]], they quickly defeated the Omegans.{{r|ClanDestine Vol 1 4}}

After their defeat, the Omegans trained to strike back at the [[Clan Destine (Earth-616)|Clan Destine]].{{r|ClanDestine Vol 1 6}}

When Griffin received a tip about Clan Destine anonymously from [[Guild (Earth-616)|Guild]], he and the Omegans began surveillance of [[Ravenscroft]].{{r|ClanDestine Vol 2 1}} They also began experimenting with ways to neutralize the powers of Clan Destine.{{r|ClanDestine Vol 2 2}} Griffin's obsession with revenge led [[Raee (Earth-616)|Raee]] to believe his flawed logic was leading him to try to replace the Omegans and become superhuman himself.{{r|ClanDestine Vol 2 3}}{{r|ClanDestine Vol 2 5}}

Releasing the clones of [[Walter Destine (Clone) (Earth-616)|Wallop]], [[Rory Destine (Clone) (Earth-616)|Crimson Crusader]], and [[Pandora Destine (Clone) (Earth-616)|Imp]] led to the capture of Wallop, [[Samantha Destine (Earth-616)|Argent]], and Cuckoo.{{r|ClanDestine Vol 2 4}} However, Raee rebelled against Alpha's command to torture their prisoners. During a brief scuffle, Griffin was accidentally imbued with immense magical power. As Super-Griffin quickly defeated Clan Destine, [[Adam Destine (Earth-616)|Adam Destine]] and [[Elalyth (Earth-616)|Elalyth]] arrived to protect their children. Adam depower Griffin and deaged him to an infant and left him in the care of the Omegans.{{r|ClanDestine Vol 2 5}}

| Notes                   = 
| Trivia                  = * On his website, creator [[Alan Davis]] said ''"There are five Omegans named-- Noe, Raee, Mai, Phaa and Giee. I based the names on an eastern variation (five tone) of the familiar Musical scale (seven tone) doh, ray, me, fah, soh, lah and te. Fourteen years ago, when I did all of the research for the Clandestine, I used a reference library, with actual books, and the only record I have of the scale is a handwritten note. I believe my note to be accurate but I haven’t been able to discover any information that matches my list, of the eastern tonal progression, in any online search. I’d be interested in any information that might point me in the right direction."''{{r|{{cite web|url=http://www.alandavis-forum.com/viewtopic.php?f=2&t=311&p=2028&hilit=thaddeus#p2028|title=Adam, Albert, and an Omegan Questions|work=alandavis-forum.com|first=Alan|last=Davis|date=6 August 2005|accessdate=30 June 2021}}}}
